title: Futuristic Font
content:
I forget the name of this one. Thanks.

author: HSR Classic

comments.content:
I think it’s called UltraBronzo or something.

- Lex

It looks like the [Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011833/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/UltraBronzo/mudTyper+Weights/) weight, artificially obliqued.

- Lex
Yes, that’s the name. Thank you.
